channel.description: i have funscap3 downloaded, where do i go to edit the player limit[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 08:56:59 PM[/size][hr]some 1 help im getting hacked an deverything and to many players please.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 09:04:08 PM[/size][hr]pleassee freaking help

item.title: How to edit player limit loggin
item.dc:creator: @ieatadogi ieatadogi
item.description:
@ieatadogi wrote:

i tried that the players just keep logging in!! this is what i did

public static final int maxPlayers = 10; and it dont work~~[br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2007, 09:35:17 PM[/size][hr]???

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit player limit loggin

item.title: How to edit player limit loggin
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

o you mean you getting nulls or your getting to many players
nulls = no char but accepted connection
players = logged in and can play and you see them

to edit player limit open up PlayerHandler.java
and find

public static final int maxPlayers =

and change the number after the = sign

Read full topic
